entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CALM WINDS

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

LOWS AROUND 70

HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
